= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *BA* || *Comments* ||
|| *PCA.SPL* || Superior parietal lobule || Spatial orientation, Representation of the self || 7 || Precuneus, Posterior parietal cortex ||
|| *PCA.IPL* || Inferior parietal lobule || Perception of emotions in facial stimuli and interpretation of sensory information || 40 || Represent spoken words ||
|| *PCA.IPS* || Intraparietal Sulcus || Perceptual-motor coordination and visual attention || 39 || Directing eye movements and reaching, Represent written words ||
|| *PCA.RSC* || Retrosplenial Cortex || Processing of emotionally salient stimuli || 26,29,30 || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.PCG* || Posterior Cingulate Cortex || Self-awareness, pain and episodic memory retrieval || 23,31 || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.SA* || Somatosensory Association Cortex || Locating objects in space || 5 || ||

= Groupings and Subdivisions  =

  * PCA.IPS is divided into MIP, LIP, VIP, AIP
